ai-ja159:1.1_0: “That One who gives Vision, the sole king, goes down,
ai-ja159:1.2_0: he is golden coloured, he enlightens the earth,
ai-ja159:1.3_0: therefore I revere the golden coloured one, who enlightens the earth,
ai-ja159:1.4_0: guarded by you today, we will live out the day.
ai-ja159:2.1_0: I revere those brahmins who have true understanding
ai-ja159:2.3_0: Hail Awakened Ones, I revere the auspicious Bodhi (Tree),
ai-ja159:2.4_0: Reverence to the Free! Reverence to Freedom!
ai-ja159:3.1_0: the Visionary One, the sole king, goes down,
ai-ja159:3.2_0: he is golden coloured, he enlightens the earth,
ai-ja159:3.3_0: therefore I revere the golden coloured one, who enlightens the earth,
ai-ja159:3.4_0: guarded by you today, we will live out the night.
ai-ja159:4.1_0: I revere those brahmins who have true understanding
ai-ja159:4.3_0: Hail Awakened Ones, I revere the auspicious Bodhi (Tree),
ai-ja159:4.4_0: Reverence to the Free! Reverence to Freedom!
